name: Wheel Of Doom
description:
Wheel Of Doom is an Android mobile game in which you deck your wheel out with a bunch of crazy guns guns to destroy the incoming hordes!  Think of it almost as a reverse bullet-hell.  This is the version that was demo'd successfully at Avcon 2019.  It is a single level where the aim is to survive as long as you can and post the highest score.

Note:  This is just a demo and a work in progress.  It was primarily designed for a tablet (specifically a Samsung Galaxy Tab S5E that was used at Avcon) so if used on any other device there could potentially be some UI issues.
